legacy.title: Our Legacy
legacy.description: Rooted in a legacy of excellence, we are a team of dynamic professionals who have honed our expertise while working in pivotal roles at leading companies. With our origins tracing back to Istanbul Technical University, our journey has taken us through a spectrum of roles, including Systems Engineers, Principal Consultants, Managers, and Directors. Drawing from this rich tapestry of experience, we possess an intricate understanding of IT infrastructure management. Our mission is to seamlessly channel this wealth of knowledge to our clients, offering tailored solutions that pave the path to their success. At the core of our approach lies a commitment to crafting strategies that align with their unique objectives and aspirations.

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: At TSS-X Information Technologies, our team of IT professionals is dedicated to helping our clients get the most out of their IT infrastructure. We specialize in IT automation services, with an experienced team that has worked in many areas of IT infrastructure, including application, database, server, storage, network and security.
